Data Fields
EDMA_errorInfo_t_ Struct Reference

Error Information structure. Information is from EMR(H), QEMR, CCERR registers as per EDMA UG. More...

#include <drivers/edma/edma.h>

Data Fields

bool isDmaChannelEventMiss [EDMA_NUM_DMA_CHANNELS]
 Each element of the array indicates whether a DMA channel event is missed for the corresponding DMA channel index.
 
bool isQdmaChannelEventMiss [EDMA_NUM_QDMA_CHANNELS]
 Each element of the array indicates whether a QDMA channel event is missed for the corresponding QDMA channel index.
 
bool isOutstandingTransferCompletionTransfersExceededLimit
 CCERR::TCERR in EDMA UG.
 
bool isEventQueueThresholdExceeded [EDMA_MAX_NUM_EVENT_QUEUES]
 CCERR::QTHRXCDx bits in EDMA UG.
 
uint8_t numEventQueues
 Number of event Queues of the opened CC provided as convenience these many elements will be relevent in the isEventQueueThresholdExceeded array.
 

Detailed Description

Error Information structure. Information is from EMR(H), QEMR, CCERR registers as per EDMA UG.
